turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee drink for mt afternoon break.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. From which coffee shop should l order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in my building fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you have a particular drink in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in the mood for something sweet, but not chocolatey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A caramel cloud macchiato or cinnamon dolce latte maybe?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A cinnamon latte sounds great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hot or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the options again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole, 2%, nonfat, coconut, almond or soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have it with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And with whip or not.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With whip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Have them add an extra shot of espresso please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. No problem. Order has been made.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will the drink be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should be about 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thanks.
